import React, { useState,Fragment } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { FaInstagram } from "react-icons/fa"; import Fade from "react-reveal/Fade"; import { useSelector } from "react-redux"; export default function Navigation() { const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const cart = useSelector((state) => state.cart); const {cartItems}=cart const useSignIn = useSelector(state => state.userSignin) const{userInfo}=userSignin return (
Home
About
setShow(!show)} >
setShow(!show)}>Photography
{show && (
Fashion
Visions
Souls in a Box
)}
On-Line Shop
{cartItems.length > 0 &&(

{cartItems.length} in Cart

)}
Collaborations
Contacts
{ userInfo? ( {userInfo.name} ):{ } }
Sign In
 ); }
